CoreData¶

DataCore¶

created

2019-07-22

author

Leandro (Cerberus1746) Benedet Garcia

class panda_core_data.data_core.DataCore¶

Class where everything is kept.

__call__(mods_path, **kwargs)¶

Automatically import all data types based on the paths in the params.

Parameters

  • mods_path (str) – Absolute root folder to the root mods folder

  • core_mod_folder (str) – Name of the core mod folder. The base mod.

  • raws_folder (str) – Name of the raw folder.

  • models_folder (str) – Name of the models folder.

  • templates_folder (str) – Name of the templates folder.

  • raw_models_folder (str) – Name of the raws that are related to the models. Default is ‘models_folder’ param.

  • raw_templates_folder (str) – Name of the raws that are related to the templates. Default is the ‘templates_folder’ param

Raises

PCDFolderNotFound – If any of the folders are invalid.

static __new__(cls)¶

Create and return a new object. See help(type) for accurate signature.

class panda_core_data.data_core_bases.base_data.Group(group_name: str)¶

Class that is used to store Models or Templates

DataModel¶

created

2019-07-22

author

Leandro (Cerberus1746) Benedet Garcia

class panda_core_data.data_core_bases.data_model.DataModel¶

classdocs

add_model_module(path)¶

Recursively add a model module from the supplied path.

Parameters

path (str) – Path to the model module

add_model_to_group(group_name: str, model, auto_create_group=True)¶

Add the supplied Model type to the group.

Parameters

  • group_name (str) – Name of the group

  • model (Model) – The Model type to be added.

  • auto_create_group (bool) – If the group should be automatically created if it doesn’t exist.

  • replace (bool) – If the Model type should be replaced if it already exists.

property all_models¶

Get all model types

get_model_type(name: str, group_name: str = 'DEFAULT_DATA_GROUP', default=None, group_default=None)¶

Get Model type from the specified group.

Parameters

  • name (str) – Name of the Model type.

  • group_name (str) – Name of the group.

  • default (any) – Default value to return if the Model type couldn’t be found.

  • group_default (any) – Default value to return if the group couldn’t be found.

get_or_create_model_group(name: str)¶

Get or create the model group. If it doesn’t exist, it will be created.

Parameters

name (str) – Name of the group.

class panda_core_data.data_core_bases.data_template.DataTemplate¶

classdocs

add_template_module(path)¶

Recursively add a template module from the supplied path.

Parameters

path (str) – Path to the template module

add_template_to_group(group_name: str, model, auto_create_group: bool = True)¶

Add the supplied Template type to the group.

Parameters

  • group_name (str) – Name of the group

  • template (Template) – The Template type to be added.

  • auto_create_group (bool) – If the group should be automatically created if it doesn’t exist.

  • replace (bool) – If the Template type should be replaced if it already exists.

property all_templates¶

Get all template types

get_or_create_template_group(name: str)¶

Get or create the template group. If it doesn’t exist, it will be created.

Parameters

name (str) – Name of the group.

get_template_type(name: str, group_name: str = 'DEFAULT_DATA_GROUP', default=None, group_default=None)¶

Get Template type from the specified group.

Parameters

  • name (str) – Name of the Template type.

  • group_name (str) – Name of the group.

  • default (any) – Default value to return if the Template type couldn’t be found.

  • group_default (any) – Default value to return if the group couldn’t be found.
